cause.description:
we are trying to lower the drinking age in the united states to 18
1. by the time your 18 your adult enough to drink
2. drinking is a large part of every society
3. most drinking ages in eurpoe are 16 so why cant we be 18
4. this site has the pention about the drinking age http://www.petitiononline.com/AD793/petition.html
cause.name: Lower the drinking age
